Package grafiosch.common

Class DataHelper

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.common.DataHelper
public class DataHelper extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for data manipulation and reflection.

    • setEmptyStringToNullOrRemoveTraillingSpaces

      public static void setEmptyStringToNullOrRemoveTraillingSpaces(Object object) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException
      Sets empty string properties of an object to null and trims trailing spaces from non-empty string properties.
      Parameters:
      object - The object whose string properties are to be processed.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      InvocationTargetException
      NoSuchMethodException

    • generateGUID

      public static String generateGUID()
      Generates a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) string. Dashes are removed from the standard UUID format.
      Returns:
      A GUID string without dashes.

    • getDiffPropertiesOfEntity

      public static List<ProposeChangeField> getDiffPropertiesOfEntity(Object newEntity, Object existingEntity, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException
      Compares the properties of two entities of the same class that are annotated with specified update property level annotations. It returns a list of ProposeChangeField objects representing the differences. This is not a deep comparison.
      Parameters:
      newEntity - The new entity with potentially changed values.
      existingEntity - The existing entity to compare against.
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - A set of annotation classes that mark the properties to be compared.
      Returns:
      A list of ProposeChangeField objects detailing the differing properties and their new values.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      InvocationTargetException
      NoSuchMethodException

    • fieldContainsAnnotation

      public static boolean fieldContainsAnnotation(Field field, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses)
      Checks if a field is annotated with any of the specified annotation classes.
      Parameters:
      field - The field to check.
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - A set of annotation classes to look for.
      Returns:
      true if the field is annotated with at least one of the specified annotations, false otherwise.

    • getFieldByPropertiesAnnotation

      public static List<Field> getFieldByPropertiesAnnotation(Class<?> clazz, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses)
      Retrieves all fields of a class that are annotated with any of the specified annotation classes.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class to inspect.
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - A set of annotation classes that mark the properties to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Field objects that are annotated with at least one of the specified annotations.

    • updateEntityWithUpdatable

      public static void updateEntityWithUpdatable(Object source, Object target, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException
      Copies properties from a source object to a target object, but only for fields in the target object that are annotated with specified update property level annotations. If a field is annotated with PropertySelectiveUpdatableOrWhenNull and the corresponding property in the target is not null, it will not be overwritten.
      Parameters:
      source - The source object from which to copy properties.
      target - The target object to which properties are copied.
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - A set of annotation classes that mark the properties to be updated in the target object.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      InvocationTargetException
      NoSuchMethodException

    • updateEntityWithUpdatable

      public static <T extends Annotation> void updateEntityWithUpdatable(Object source, Object[] targets, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException
      Copies properties from a source object to an array of target objects, applying the same logic as updateEntityWithUpdatable(Object, Object, Set).
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the annotation.
      Parameters:
      source - The source object from which to copy properties.
      targets - An array of target objects to which properties are copied.
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - A set of annotation classes that mark the properties to be updated in the target objects.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      InvocationTargetException
      NoSuchMethodException
